mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectInfAffOrd Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ AFF_ORD_SN , AFF_ORD_TURN , AFF_ORD_DT , AFF_COM_NM , AFF_COM_ID , AFF_GOD_ORD_NO , AFF_ITM_ORD_NO , CSTMR_NM , MOBIL_NATION_NO , MOBIL_AREA_NO , MOBIL_TLOF_NO , MOBIL_TLOF_WTHN_NO , TEL_NATION_NO , TEL_AREA_NO , TEL_TLOF_NO , TEL_TLOF_WTHN_NO , CSTMR_POST_NO , CSTMR_BASE_ADDR , CSTMR_DETAIL_ADDR , ERP_GOD_NO , ITM_NM , QTY , DLV_MEMO , GOD_MEMO , MALL_ID , ORD_NO , ORD_GOD_TURN , PCKAGESHAPE_ORD_GOD_NO , ITM_NO , COM_ID , BRND_ID , GOD_TP_CD , GOD_NO , GOD_NM , CRNCY_CD , PAY_EXCHG_RT_CSMR_PRC , RTL_PRC , CSMR_PRC , AFF_COM_FEE_RT , SLDOUT_YN , GFT_YN , AFF_ORD_STAT_CD , AFF_ORD_STAT_CONT , AFF_VRSC_COM_ID , AFF_VRSC_COM_FEE_RT , PCKAGESHAPE_GOD_NO , PCKAGESHAPE_GOD_ITM_NM , SALE_SHOP_NO , AFF_FEE_EVENT_SN , VRSC_COM_FEE_EVENT_SN , REORD_YN , SALE_PRC , AFF_COM_SALE_PRC , AFF_COM_ORD_GOD_NO , AFF_COM_SHOP_NM , CSTMR_ID , DLV_NATION_CD , DLV_CST_CRNCY_CD , PAY_EXCHG_RT_DLV_CST , DLV_CST , CAFE24_ORD_YN , CAFE24_DLV_CST , EXCHG_RT , CAFE24_GOD_CPN_DC_AMT , CAFE24_ORD_CPN_DC_AMT , CAFE24_OVSEA_ORD_GOD_CPN_DC_AM , CAFE24_OVSEA_ORD_CPN_DC_AMT , CAFE24_GOD_CPN_NO , CAFE24_ORD_CPN_NO , COM_DLV_CST , FASTBOX_DLV_CST , PG_TP_CD , PG_STORE_ID , TMALL_GLB_LMTT_INV_USE_YN , TMALL_EVT_LMTT_INV_USE_YN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM INF_AFF_ORD WHERE 1 = 1 AND AFF_ORD_SN = #{affOrdSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND AFF_ORD_TURN = #{affOrdTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
